entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight except gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind north 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Bowen Island early in the evening. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
